name: Mizuho Financial Group, Inc.
membership: MHFG and its subsidiaries are members of various trade associations relating to financial services in different jurisdictions , the principal such association being the Japanese Bankers association
goal: Mizuho Financial Group Inc is the holding company of a financial services group that together with its subsidiaries and affiliates provides banking , trust banking , securities and other financial services . Headquartered in Japan , the group and its constituent entities has over five hundred branches in Japan and over 80 offices outside of Japan.
interests: Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
euInitiatives: All those initiatives and policies relating to financial services companies , whether incorporated in an EU jurisdiction or relevant to an institution incorporated or headquartered in Japan providing financial services into the EU
